title: How to hide "size"
text: On the standard label, the text "size" appears before the size description. Some customers find it annoying that only size appears on the label when they have an item that doesn't have a size, see screenshot from KDG. If you go to the label layouter System -> Service -> logical labels and change the label layout you can double-click on the text "Gr." and enter this expression instead of the text "Gr.": Cond(@Size >'0','Gr.','') Result: the word "Gr." is no longer printed on a label without a size
description:
On the standard label, the text "size" appears before the size description.


Some customers find it annoying that only size appears on the label when they have an item that doesn't have a size, see screenshot from KDG.



If you go to the label layouter


System -> Service -> logical labels and change the label layout






you can double-click on the text "Gr."


and enter this expression instead of the text "Gr.":


Cond(@Size >'0','Gr.','')



Result: the word "Gr." is no longer printed on a label without a size
